verbs.description: [ARG0: russia germany france and turkey] [V: meet] [ARGM-PRP: for four - way syria summit] the leaders of russia germany france and turkey gathered in istanbul on saturday for a summit on syria where violence this week in the last remaining major rebel stronghold highlighted the fragility of a deal to avert a massive government offensive idlib assad angela merkel principal turkey staffan de mistura istanbul france reuters belarus chancellor moscow ankara germany peter graff vladimir putin president u n ali kucukgocmen erdogan david dolan emmanuel macron maria tsvetkova syria president bashar al - assad russia bashar al assad
